name: Web Zombie
description: The Web Zombie is a medium undead creature with a decaying, grotesque appearance that reflects its corrupt nature. It has the ability to climb vertical surfaces like a spider and can move freely through webs without becoming ensnared.
memorable: Its ability to cling to ceilings and attack targets with necrotic-infused melee strikes makes it a terrifying and adaptable opponent.
goals: To ambush and ensnare living creatures, using its necrotic attacks to weaken them.
relations: Often found alongside other undead creatures, especially in areas with abundant webbing or ruins.
environment: Dungeons, ruins, or locations where undead gather, often in the presence of arachnids.
strengths: Necrotic damage enhancement on melee attacks and the ability to potentially survive lethal blows make it a persistent threat.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity and low Armor Class make it vulnerable to attacks if it can't utilize its mobility effectively.
attacks: The Web Zombie performs multiattack with slam attacks that can restrain targets, making it a danger in close quarters.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Fortitude allows it to continue fighting after being reduced to 0 hit points, unless hit with radiant damage.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in dim light as if it were bright light, though its passive Perception is below average.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.
Can ignore webbing constraints due to Web Walker ability.
May climb walls and ceilings effortlessly with Spider Climb ability.
Necrotic Weapons ability adds extra damage, increasing its lethality.
Ability to restrain targets using its slam attacks.
test_queries: zombie that restrains targets in webbing
undead that moves freely through webs
